title: I need Red to confirm if this is legit...

embed.description: For League of Legends on the PC, a GameFAQs message board topic titled "List of leaks! Champs, skins, reworks! ULTIMATE LUX SKIN HYPE WAT WAT WAT".

replies.body:
A lot of these were previously announced by Riot in the first place.  
The next Ultimate skin IS ment to be a midlaner or support so it's entirely possible it's lux but I wouldnt say she's the most likely.

I really think it's gonna be Zed.

I  really do.

(I hope it is.)

If it's leaked info Rito didn't want leaked then good luck getting confirmation from a Rioter.

I think you're wasting your time.

Wait for an official announcement.
If it's a /r/leagueoflegends leak on Reddit, then it's a lie. Everyone is trolling, trying to be WhyRenektonWhy.
